description:
This DLC contains a new character for NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS, as well as various other content to enhance your playing experience.

Includes:
• Character: Kurenai Yuhi
• Combination Secret Technique:  x 2
- Evil Illusion: Tree Binding Wind Blade (Kurenai x Asuma)
- Six Paths: Shinsu Rasen Shuriken (Ashura x Hashirama x Naruto)
• Matching Voice x 12
• Ninja Info Card Image x 5

*This DLC is included in the Season Pass. Please be mindful of duplicate purchases.
name: NBUNSC -  DLC Pack 3
